Integrate with Slack

Integrate your Slack workspace in your Soda Cloud account so that Soda Cloud can send Slack notifications to your team when a data issue triggers an alert.

  1. In Soda Cloud, navigate to Profile > Organization Settings > Integrations, then follow the guided steps to authorize Soda Cloud to connect to your Slack workspace.
  2. Select the all Slack channels to which you might send notifications when Soda finds an issue with your data, then Save.

Go further

  • Create an alert to send Slack notifications when a scan surfaces a data issue.
  • Connect Soda SQL to your Soda Cloud account.
